body:
The spark gist looks fine to me.

Does it matter that we are only filtering 43.0.1, and not any other variant of 43, which I know exist. That shouldn't result in _zero_ pings though.

Can we filter by Firefox 43 in Spark, to make sure that we have any data from the expected users?

One thing to keep in mind is that we expect to not have any data from Firefox 43 for some period of time, including some days when this recipe was active, due to #277.
